trans-unit.source: Provides a type-safe collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Olyan típus szálbiztos biztosít <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Hozzáad egy <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> a gyűjteményhez.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> hozzáadására a gyűjteményhez.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Az index a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> , amely a gyűjtemény lett hozzáadva.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi, hogy egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"> </xref> tartalmazza a megadott <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> kereséséhez.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> a gyűjteményben szereplő; egyéb, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref> values to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Másolja a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"> </xref> értékeket egy egydimenziós <xref:System.Array>a megadott indexpozíciónál.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az egydimenziós <xref:System.Array>átmásolva érték, amely a cél a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index in the `array` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Az index a `array` ahol másolása kezdődik.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indexét adja vissza egy <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> a a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> kereséséhez.

trans-unit.source: The index of the of value in the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Az index a a value a a , ha található, ha sikertelen, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> into the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Szúrja be a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> azokat a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"> </xref> a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where `value` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét ahol `value` kell beilleszteni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> szúrható be.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> megadott.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> megadott.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A megadott <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes a specific <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolít egy adott <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> a a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> </xref> eltávolítása a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"> </xref>.
